V03vinv14_u:2_1: tataḥ śāstrāṇi vigarhitvā saṃghena pṛṣṭaḥ poṣadhaḥ //
V03vinv14_u:2_3: tac ca poṣadhasūtraṃ madhyamāgame saṃgītanipāte paṭhyate //
V03vinv14_u:5_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā saṃghasthavireṇa tv ardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśa uddeṣṭavya iti /
V03vinv14_u:5_3: sa kathayati / āyuṣman na (312r1 = GBM 6.936) śuddhā tāvad bhikṣuparṣat* /
V03vinv14_u:5_5: tvam eva tāvat* / katham ahaṃ sthavireṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:5_6: divyena cakṣuṣā / hantedānīṃ naṣṭāḥ smaḥ / yatra bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā codayanti smārayanti /
V03vinv14_u:5_7: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv14_u:5_9: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:5_10: bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuṃ codayati smārayati sātisāro bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:6_0: yathā divyena cakṣuṣā evaṃ divyena śrotreṇa /
V03vinv14_u:7_0: punar apy asāv upadhivārikaḥ saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā kathayati /
V03vinv14_u:7_2: sa kathayati / (MSV III 108) āyuṣmann apariśuddhā tāvad bhikṣuparṣat* /
V03vinv14_u:7_4: tvam eva tāvat* / sthavira katham nāma tvayā saṃghamadhye mama śirasi muṣṭir nipātitā /
V03vinv14_u:7_5: aho batāhaṃ tvayā ekānte coditaḥ syām iti /
V03vinv14_u:7_6: sa tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ / etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv14_u:7_7: bhagavān āha / ekānte codayitavyo na saṃghamadhye /
V03vinv14_u:7_8: saced ekānte codyamāno na smarati smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:7_11: bhagavān āha / avacanīyaḥ kartavyaḥ / avacanīyaḥ kṛtaḥ / tathāpy anyenānyaṃ pratisarati /
V03vinv14_u:7_12: bhagavān āha / avavādo 'sya sthāpayitavyaḥ poṣadhaḥ pravāraṇā ca /

V03vinv14_u:18_1: katamāni / pārājiko na bhavati / pārājikakathā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:18_3: śikṣāpratyākhyānakathā na (MSV III 112) na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:18_6: śīlavipanno na bhavati na dṛṣṭivipanno nācāravipanno nājīvavipannaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:19_0: kathaṃ pārājiko na bhavati / yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyamānam* /
V03vinv14_u:19_1: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:20_1: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:20_2: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā /
V03vinv14_u:20_3: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:20_4: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya ca poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:21_1: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kriyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kurvāṇam* /
V03vinv14_u:21_2: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /

V03vinv14_u:41_0: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ saṃghāḥ / katame paṃca / alajjisaṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaḥ saṃvṛtisaṃghaḥ paramārthasaṃghaś ca /
V03vinv14_u:42_0: alajjisaṃghaḥ katamaḥ / yatra sarve bhikṣavo duḥśīlāḥ pāpadharmāṇaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:42_1: eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ katamaḥ / yatra na sūtradharo na vinayadharo na mātṛkādharaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:42_2: gaṇasaṃghaḥ katamaḥ / yatra gaṇasaṃbandhena karmāṇi (MSV III 117) kriyante /
V03vinv14_u:42_3: saṃvṛtisaṃghaḥ katamaḥ / sarve pṛthagjanakalyāṇakāḥ / paramārthasaṃghaḥ katamaḥ / śaikṣāśaikṣā aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:42_4: tatra ye pūrvakās trayaḥ saṃghāḥ alajjinaḥ saṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaś ca labhyam ebhir adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:42_5: yo 'yaṃ saṃvṛtisaṃgho labhyam anena dharmasaṃjñinā adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:42_6: yas tv ayaṃ paramārthasaṃgho na labhyam anenādharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
